enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Screen Cultures PhD students or by permission of instructor.
Add Consent: Department Consent Required
title: SoC RTVF 502-0-20 Writing Practicum

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course is designed to assist Screen Cultures graduate students to achieve two goals: to become familiar with the process of writing a Ph.D. dissertation and to produce a dissertation prospectus. It is also part of your professionalization training. As such, it involves a series of professionalization classes, workshops, and talks on conference presentation, job search, developing research questions, and academic writing and publication, some of which will also be open to all Screen Cultures graduate students and faculty. In addition, the student will present and critically analyze and discuss the drafts of each other's prospectuses throughout the term, resulting in a relatively polished prospectus by each student.

subject: RTVF
